Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Dark Knight' (2008), which of the following statements are true regarding the character Bruce Wayne?
Options:
A. A. Christian Bale plays the role of Bruce Wayne.
B. B. Bruce Wayne is the alter ego of Batman.
C. C. Bruce Wayne is portrayed by Heath Ledger.
D. D. Bruce Wayne is a wealthy businessman.

In the movie 'The Dark Knight' (2008), which of the following statements about Michael Caine's character are true?
Options:
A. A. Michael Caine plays the role of Alfred Pennyworth.
B. B. Alfred Pennyworth is the main antagonist of the film.
C. C. Alfred Pennyworth serves as a confidant to Bruce Wayne.
D. D. Michael Caine is known for his role as a superhero in this movie.

In the movie 'The Dark Knight' (2008), which of the following statements are true regarding Heath Ledger's portrayal of The Joker?
Options:
A. Heath Ledger's performance was critically acclaimed.
B. The Joker is portrayed as a heroic figure in the film.
C. Heath Ledger won a posthumous Academy Award for his role.
D. The Joker's character aims to spread chaos and corruption in Gotham.
Correct Answer: Heath Ledger's performance was critically acclaimed., Heath Ledger won a posthumous Academy Award for his role., The Joker's character aims to spread chaos and corruption in Gotham.

Question & Options:

C. C) Gary Oldman is known for his role in a different superhero film.
D. D) James Gordon collaborates with Batman to fight crime.

B. B) Rachel Dawes is a contender for the position of assistant district attorney.
